<record_update table="x_snc_amazon_echo_intent">
    <x_snc_amazon_echo_intent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <active>true</active>
        <always_available>false</always_available>
        <category/>
        <fallback>false</fallback>
        <intent_ends_session>false</intent_ends_session>
        <keyword>SecurityThreatStatus</keyword>
        <name>Are there any Security threats?</name>
        <next_intent>9f270c36db463a00d1a9f1351d96195d</next_intent>
        <order>500</order>
        <output_speech_format>SSML</output_speech_format>
        <reprompt_speech_format/>
        <script><![CDATA[(function(current, content, attributes, ER, IntentUtils){	
	var sirCount = 0;
	var vulnCount = 0;
	var msg = '<speak>';

	var ga = new GlideAggregate('sn_si_incident');
	ga.addEncodedQuery('priority=1');
	ga.addAggregate('COUNT');
	ga.query();
	if (ga.next()) 
		sirCount = ga.getAggregate('COUNT');

	if (sirCount > 0)
		msg += "There " + (sirCount > 1 ? 'are' : 'is') + " <say-as interpret-as='cardinal'>" + sirCount + "</say-as> open, critical Security Incidents. ";

	ga = new GlideAggregate('sn_vul_vulnerable_item');
	ga.addEncodedQuery('priority=1');
	ga.addAggregate('COUNT');
	ga.query();
	if (ga.next()) 
		vulnCount = ga.getAggregate('COUNT');	

	if (vulnCount > 0)
		msg += "There " + (vulnCount > 1 ? 'are' : 'is')  + " <say-as interpret-as='cardinal'>" + vulnCount + "</say-as> critical-priority Vulnerable item" + (vulnCount > 1 ? 's' : '') + ". ";

	msg += "To hear more information, say ";
	msg += "'Hear Security Incidents' or 'Hear Vulnerable Items'. ";
	msg += '</speak>';

	ER.setOutputSpeech(current.output_speech_format, "", msg);
	//ER.setReprompt("PlainText/SSML", "Text goes here", "SSML goes here");
	//ER.setAttributes(attrObj); = Object of session attributes

	ER.setEnd(current.intent_ends_session);

	result = ER.response; 

})(current, content, attributes, new EchoResponseBuilder(), new IntentUtils());]]></script>
